text: Phoebe Buffay is a fictional character on the American sitcom Friends. She is portrayed by Lisa Kudrow. Buffay sang terrible songs at Central Perk. Then she worked as a massage therapist. Her dad left her, her twin sister (Ursula), and her stepmother who would later commit suicide. She would later marry Mike Hanagan. Category:Fictional American people Category:Friends characters
title: Phoebe Buffay
